Methods of Learning a Programming Languange

5 items

  • Just using tools, packages, libraries, prepared functions, prepared classes, and objects.
    1. Using simplified data type with a lot of overhead like vector, string, anf etc.
    2. algorithm
    3. Using other libraries without knowing how they develop
    4. Always searching for new tools, language, packages, etc.
    5. Consider most language similar
    6. More tools, packages, languages, and alike means a better programmer
    7. Shallow understanding of the concept of each language and its basis
  • Deeply learn the foundation of the language of the essential aspect of a language
    1. Step by Step learning of the language by writing programs
    2. Using basis to make new tools instead of using other tools
    3. Preparing for writing more sophisticated programs
    4. Deep understanding of each tool/package/library/etc.
    5. Learning and using the best tool based on the application requirement

Converting C code to C++

  1. Rename .c file to .cpp
  2. Change <stdio.h> to <cstdio> (c standard library)
    • stdio.h → cstdio
    • math.h → cmath
    • stdlib.h → cstdlib
    • string.h → csting
    • ctype.h → cctype
    • https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C_standard_library
    • https://en.cppreference.com/w/c/header
  3. Add the follwing line after includes
    • using namespace std;
  4. Compile using C++ compiler like g++

code1.c

code1.cpp

 1 #include<stdio.h>
 2 int main(){
 3   int s1, s2, s3, sum;
 4   printf("Enter mark\n");
 5   scanf("%d", &s1 );
 6   printf("Enter mark\n");
 7   scanf("%d", &s2 );
 8   printf("Enter mark\n");
 9   scanf("%d", &s3 );
10   sum = s1 + s2 + s3;
11   printf("%d\n", sum);
12   return 0;
13 }
 1 #include<cstdio>
 2 using namespace std;
 3 int main(){
 4   int s1, s2, s3, sum;
 5   printf("Enter mark\n");
 6   scanf("%d", &s1);
 7   printf("Enter mark\n");
 8   scanf("%d", &s2);
 9   printf("Enter mark\n");
10   scanf("%d", &s3);
11   sum = s1 + s2 + s3;
12   printf("%d\n", sum);
13   return 0;
14 }

c2cpp01_stdlib.c

c2cpp01_stdlib.cpp

 1 #include<stdio.h>
 2 #include<math.h>
 3 #include<stdlib.h>
 4 
 5 int main(){
 6   int i=1,a=2,b,c=3;
 7   b = i>a ? a>c ? c:a : i>c?c:i;
 8   printf("%d\t",b);
 9   printf("%d\n", i>a ? a>c?c:a : i>c?c:i);
10   b=1;a=2;c=1;
11   printf("%d\t",b+=a+=c);
12   printf("%d,%d,%d\n",b,a,c);
13   printf("%d\n",printf("%d\n",b));
14   printf("%lf\n",sin(0.12));
15   printf("%d\n",abs(-12));
16   printf("%lf\n",fabs(-0.12));
17   printf("%lf\n",pow(2,4));
18   printf("%lf\n",sqrt(2));
19   printf("%lf\n",pow(2,0.5));
20   i=2;a=3;b=4;
21   i= a,b; /*   */
22   printf("%d\t",i);
23   return 0;
24 }
 1 #include<cstdio>
 2 #include<cmath>
 3 #include<cstdlib>
 4 using namespace std;
 5 int main(){
 6   int i=1,a=2,b,c=3;
 7   b = i>a ? a>c ? c:a : i>c?c:i;
 8   printf("%d\t",b);
 9   printf("%d\n", i>a ? a>c?c:a : i>c?c:i);
10   b=1;a=2;c=1;
11   printf("%d\t",b+=a+=c);
12   printf("%d,%d,%d\n",b,a,c);
13   printf("%d\n",printf("%d\n",b));
14   printf("%lf\n",sin(0.12));
15   printf("%d\n",abs(-12));
16   printf("%lf\n",fabs(-0.12));
17   printf("%lf\n",pow(2,4));
18   printf("%lf\n",sqrt(2));
19   printf("%lf\n",pow(2,0.5));

c2cpp02_functions.c

c2cpp02_functions.cpp

 1 #include<stdio.h> /* ./a.out >a1.txt */
 2 int min(int, int); int input(void);
 3 void myf(void);void printTriangle(void);
 4 void printSquare(void);
 5 int main(){int n;
 6   do{
 7     printf("Enter your choice. \
 8              Enter 4 for end\n");
 9     n=input();
10     if(n==1)  myf();
11     else if(n==2)printTriangle();
12     else if(n==3)printSquare();
13     else if(n!=4)printf("wrong number\n");
14   }while(n!=4);
15   return 0;
16 }void printSquare(void){
17   int n,i,j; n=input();
18   for(i=0;i<n;i++){
19     for(j=0;j<n;j++)   printf("*");
20     printf("\n");
21   }
22 }void printTriangle(void){
23   int n,i,j; n=input();
24   for(i=0;i<n;i++){
25     for(j=0;j<=i;j++) printf("*");
26     printf("\n");
27   }
28 }int min(int a, int b){return a<b ? a:b;}
29 int input(void){int a;
30   do{
31     printf("Enter a>0: ");
32     scanf("%d",&a);
33   }while(a<=0);
34   return a;
35 }void myf(void){
36   int a=input(), b=input();
37   printf("min %d\n",min(a,b));
38 }

13              Enter 4 for end\n");

16       myf();

18       printTriangle();

20       printSquare();

22       printf("wrong number\n");

32     printf("\n");
 1   }

 1 #include <stdio.h>
 2 struct firstStruct{  };
 3 struct secondStruct{ };
 4 struct thirdStruct{ };
 5 struct firstStruct f1(void);
 6 void f2(struct firstStruct);
 7 
 8 int main(){
 9   struct firstStruct myfs;
10   myfs = f1();
11   f2(myfs);
12   return 0;
13 }
14 struct firstStruct  f1(void){
15   struct firstStruct fs1;
16   struct secondStruct ss1;
17   struct thirdStruct ts1;
18   return fs1;
19 }
20 
21 void f2(struct firstStruct m1){
22   printf("%p\n", &m1);
23 }

struct c

struct cpp

 1 #include<stdio.h>
 2 
 3 struct date{ int year, month, day; };
 4 struct student{
 5   char name[50];
 6   char stdNumber[15];
 7   struct date birthDate;
 8 };
 9 
10 struct date input_date(void);
11 struct student input_student(void);
12 void print_date(struct date d1);
13 void print_student(struct student st);
14 
15 int main(){
16   struct student st1[50];
17   int n, i=0;
18   printf("Enter number of students(0<n<50) ");
19   scanf("%d",&n);
20   if(n>0 && n<50)
21     do{
22       st1[i] = input_student();
23       print_student(st1[i]);
24       i++;
25     }while(i<n);
26   else printf("0<n<50, %d",n);
27 }
28 struct date input_date(void){
 1 #include<iostream>
 2 using namespace std;
 3 
 4 struct date{ int year, month, day; };
 5 struct student{
 6   char name[50];
 7   char stdNumber[15];
 8   date birthDate;
 9 };
10 
11 date input_date(void);
12 student input_student(void);
13 void print_date(date d1);
14 void print_student(student st);
15 
16 int main(){
17   student st1[50];
18   int n, i=0;
19   cout << "Enter number of students(0<n<50) ";
20   cin >> n;
21   if(n>0 && n<50)
22     do{
23       st1[i] = input_student();
24       print_student(st1[i]);
25       i++;
26     }while(i<n);
27   else  { cout << "0<n<50 "; cout << n;}
28 }

struct c

struct cpp

 1   struct date d1;
 2   printf("Enter year:{1350..1390} ");
 3   scanf("%d",&d1.year);
 4   printf("Enter month{1..12}:");
 5   scanf("%d",&d1.month);
 6   printf("Enter day{1..31}:");
 7   scanf("%d",&d1.day);
 8   return d1;
 9 }
10 void print_date(struct date d1){
11   printf("year=%d,\tmonth=%d,\tday=%d\n",
12     d1.year,d1.month,d1.day);
13 }
14 struct student input_student(void){
15   struct student st;
16   printf("Enter name :");
17   scanf("%s",st.name);
18   printf("Enter studnet number :");
19   scanf("%s",st.stdNumber);
20   printf("Enter birth date :");
21   st.birthDate = input_date();
22   return st;
23 }
24 void print_student(struct student st){
25   printf("name=%s\n",st.name);
26   printf("number=%s\n",st.stdNumber);
27   print_date(st.birthDate);
28 }
 1 date input_date(void){
 2   date d1;
 3   cout << "Enter year:{1350..1390} ";
 4   cin >> d1.year;
 5   cout << "Enter month{1..12}:";
 6   cin >> d1.month;
 7   cout << "Enter day{1..31}:";
 8   cin >> d1.day;
 9   return d1;
10 }
11 void print_date(date d1){
12   cout << "year = ";  cout << d1.year;
13   cout << "\tmonth = "; cout << d1.month;
14   cout << "\tday = "; cout << d1.day; cout << "\n";
15 }
16 student input_student(void){
17   student st;
18   cout << "Enter name :";
19   cin >> st.name;
20   cout << "Enter studnet number :";
21   cin >> st.stdNumber;
22   cout << "Enter birth date :";
23   st.birthDate = input_date();
24   return st;
25 }
26 void print_student(student st){
27   cout << "name = "; cout << st.name;
28   cout << "\n"; cout << "number = ";
29   cout << st.stdNumber; cout << "\n";
30   print_date(st.birthDate);
31 }

 2 using namespace std;
 3 struct date{ int year, month, day; };
 4 date input_date(void){
 5   date d1;
 6   cout << "Enter year:{1350..1390} ";
 7   cin >> d1.year;
 8   cout << "Enter month{1..12}:";
 9   cin >> d1.month;
10   cout << "Enter day{1..31}:";
11   cin >> d1.day;
12   return d1;
13 }

15   cout << "year = ";  cout << d1.year;
16   cout << "\tmonth = "; cout << d1.month;
17   cout << "\tday = "; cout << d1.day; cout << "\n";
18 }

Encapsulation(IV)

 1 #include<iostream>
 2 using namespace std;
 3 struct complexCls{
 4   double re,img;
 5   void setRe(double r){re=r;}
 6   void setImg(double i){img=i;}
 7   double getRe(void){return re;}
 8   double getImg(void){return img;}
 9 };
10 void f1(void){
11   complexCls c1;
12   c1.re=12;
13   c1.setRe(12);
14   c1.setImg(4);
15   cout<<c1.getRe()<<endl;
16 }
17 int main(){f1();}
 1 #include<iostream>
 2 using namespace std;
 3 struct complexCls{
 4   double re,img;
 5   void setRe(double r){re=r;}
 6   void setImg(double i){img=i;}
 7   double getRe(void){return re;}
 8   double getImg(void){return img;}
 9   void set(double r=0,double i=0)
10   {re=r;img=i;}
11 };
12 void f1(void){
13   complexCls c1;
14   c1.re=12;
15   c1.setRe(12);
16   c1.setImg(4);
17   c1.set(12,14);
18   cout<<c1.getRe()<<endl;
19 }
20 int main(){f1();}

MyArray Struct(I)

 1 #include <iostream>
 2 using namespace std;
 3 struct myArray{
 4   double a[100];
 5   int n;
 6   void set(double ma[], int k){
 7     n = k;
 8     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
 9       a[i] = ma[i];
10   }
11   void print(void){
12     cout << " n = " << n << endl;
13     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
14       cout << "a[" << i << "] = "
15         << a[i] << endl;
16   }
17 };
18 int main(){
19   double x[] = {10, 12, 34, 54};
20   myArray d;
21   d.set(x, 4);
22   d.print();
23 }

 1 #include <iostream> //MyArray/100424
 2 using namespace std;
 3 const int MAX_NUMBER_OF_CELLS = 100;
 4 struct myArray{
 5   double a[MAX_NUMBER_OF_CELLS];
 6   int n = 0;
 7   void set(double ma[], int k){
 8     if(k >= 0 && k < MAX_NUMBER_OF_CELLS){
 9       n = k;
10       for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
11         a[i] = ma[i];
12     }
13     else
14       cout << "Number of Elements is wrong"
15         << k << endl;
16   }
17   void print(void){
18     cout << " n = " << n << endl;
19     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
20       cout << "a[" << i << "] = "
21         << a[i] << endl;
22   }
23 };

 1 #include <iostream> //MyArray/100426.22
 2 using namespace std;
 3 const int MAX_NUMBER_OF_CELLS = 100;
 4 struct myArray{
 5   double a[MAX_NUMBER_OF_CELLS];
 6   int n = 0;
 7   void set(const double ma[], const int k){
 8     if(k >= 0 && k < MAX_NUMBER_OF_CELLS){
 9       n = k;
10       for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
11         a[i] = ma[i];
12     }
13     else
14       cout << "Number of Elements is wrong"
15         << k << endl;
16   }
17   void print(void){
18     cout << " n = " << n << endl;
19     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
20       cout << "a[" << i << "] = "
21         << a[i] << endl;

lvalue & rvalue

 1 int ar[10] = {2, 3, 4};
 2 int a = 2, b = 3 , c = 5;
 3 a = a + 2;
 4 /* t = a + 2
 5   a = t
 6 */
 7 a = a + b + c + 2;
 8 /*
 9   t1 = a + b
10   t2 = t1  + c
11   t3 = t2 + 2
12   a = t3
13 */
14 a += a + 2;
15 // a = a + a + 2
16 // a + 2 += a // Error
17 // (a + 2) = (a + 2) + a // Error
18 // (a+2) = 2 Error
19 // a+2 = 2 Error
20 int* p = &a;
21 *p = 4; // a = 4;
22 p = ar;  // p = &ar[0]
23 *(p + 2) = 34; // p[2] = 34; ar[2] = 34;
24 p[3] = 76;

Copy constructor(II)

 1 struct myComplex{ // 100580
 2   double re, img;
 3   myComplex(const double a = 0,
 4             const double b = 0)
 5   {re = a; img = b;}
 6   myComplex(const myComplex&c){
 7     re=c.re; img=c.img;
 8     cout << "copy constructor"
 9          << endl;
10   }
11   void print(void){
12     cout << '(' << re << ", "
13          << img << ')' << endl;
14   }
15   void input(void){
16     cout << "Enter real "; cin >> re;
17     cout << "Enter imaginary ";cin >> img;
18   }
19   myComplex add(const myComplex& a){
20     myComplex r = a;  r.re  += re;
21     r.img += img;  return r;
22   }
23   myComplex sub(const myComplex& a){
24     myComplex r; r.re = re - a.re;
25     r.img = img - a.img; return r;
26   }
27   myComplex mul(const myComplex& a){
28     myComplex r;
 1     r.re = re * a.re - img * a.img;
 2     r.img = img * a.re + re * a.img;
 3     return r;
 4   }
 5 };

 8   c = a.add(b); c = a.add(2);
 9   c.print();  a.input();
10   c = a.sub(b);// c = a - b
11   c.print();  b.input();
12   c = a.mul(b);// c = a * b
13   c.print();
14 }

ComplexCls(XI)

 1 #include <iostream>
 2 using namespace std;
 3 class myComplex{ //100560
 4   double re, img;
 5   public:
 6   myComplex(double a = 0, double b = 0){
 7     re = a;
 8     img = b;
 9   }
10   void print(void){
11     cout << '(' << re << ", "
12         << img << ')' << endl;
13   }
14   void input(void){
15     cout << "real ";
16     cin >> re;
17     cout << "imaginary";
18     cin >> img;
19   }
20   myComplex add(myComplex a){
21     myComplex r = a;
22     r.re  += re;// r.re = r.re + re
23     r.img += img;
24     return r;
25   }
26   myComplex sub(myComplex a){
27     myComplex r;
28     r.re = re - a.re;
 1     r.img = img - a.img;
 2     return r;
 3   }
 4   myComplex mul(myComplex a){
 5     myComplex r;
 6     r.re = re * a.re - img * a.img;
 7     r.img = img * a.re + re * a.img;
 8     return r;
 9   }
10 };
11 void myFunction(void){
12   myComplex a(2, 3), b(4), c;
13   // b(4, 0), c(0, 0);
14   c = a.add(b);
15   // c = a + b
16   c.print();
17   a.input();
18   c = a.sub(b);
19   // c = a - b
20   c.print();
21   b.input();
22   c = a.mul(b);
23   // c = a * b
24   c.print();
25 }
26 int main(){
27   myFunction();
28   return 0;
29 }

Implicit Conversion (double to complexCls)

 1 class myComplex{ // 100562
 2   double re, img;
 3   public:
 4   myComplex(double a = 0, double b = 0){
 5     re = a;
 6     img = b;
 7   }
 8   void print(void){
 9     cout << '(' << re << ", "
10          << img << ')' << endl;
11   }
12   void input(void){
13     cout << "real part ";
14     cin >> re;
15     cout << "Enter imaginary part ";
16     cin >> img;
17   }
18   myComplex add(myComplex a){
19     myComplex r = a;
20     r.re  += re;
21     r.img += img;
22     return r;
23   }
24   myComplex sub(myComplex a){
25     myComplex r;

Explicit Constructor(I)

 1 struct myComplex{ // 100575
 2   double re, img; // explicit
 3   explicit myComplex(const double a = 0,
 4             const double b = 0){
 5     re = a;
 6     img = b;
 7   }
 8   void print(void){
 9     cout << '(' << re << ", "
10       << img << ')' << endl;
11   }
12   void input(void){
13     cout << "Enter real ";
14     cin >> re;
15     cout << "Enter imaginary ";
16     cin >> img;
17   }
18   myComplex add(const myComplex& a){
19     myComplex r = a;
20     r.re  += re;
21     r.img += img;
22     return r;
23   }
24   myComplex sub(const myComplex& a){
25     myComplex r;
26     r.re = re - a.re;
27     r.img = img - a.img;
28     return r;
29   }
 1   myComplex mul(const myComplex& a){
 2     myComplex r;
 3     r.re = re * a.re - img * a.img;
 4     r.img = img * a.re + re * a.img;
 5     return r;
 6   }
 7 };
 8 int main(){
 9   myComplex a(2, 3), b(4), c;
10   c = a.add(b);
11   // c = a.add(2);
12   c.print();
13   a.input();
14   c = a.sub(b);// c = a - b
15   c.print();
16   b.input();
17   c = a.mul(b);// c = a * b
18   c.print();
19   c.print();
20 }/*
21 (6, 3)
22 Enter real 2
23 Enter imaginary 4
24 (-2, 4)
25 Enter real 5
26 Enter imaginary 7

 1 class myArray{//myarray/102050.cpp
 2   static const int MAX = 100;
 3   double a[MAX];
 4   int n;
 5   public:
 6   double get(const int index = 0 ){
 7     if(index >=0 && index < n)
 8       return a[index];
 9     cout << "Error in getting" << endl;
10     return 0;
11   }
12   void set(const int index,
13           const double value){
14     if( index >= 0 && index < n )
15       a[index] = value;
16     else
17       cout << "Error accessing myArray"
18          << endl;
19   }
20   myArray(const double *ma = nullptr,
21       int k = 0){
22     if( k > MAX )
23       k = MAX ;
24     for(n = k--; k >= 0; k--)
25       a[k] = ma[k];
26   }
27   myArray(double x){
28     n = 1;
29     a[0] = x;
30   }
31   myArray add(myArray b){
32     myArray t = b;
33     int i;
34     for(i=0; i<t.n && i<n; i++)
 1       t.a[i]+=a[i];
 2     if(i<n)
 3       for(;i<n;i++)
 4         t.a[i] = a[i];
 5     t.n=i;
 6     return t;

10   }

34   void print(void){
35     cout << " n = " << n << endl;
36     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
37       cout << "a[" << i << "] = "
38         << a[i] << endl;
39   }
40   friend void f2(myArray k){
41     k.print();
42     cout << k.n << endl;
43   }
44 };
45 void f1(void);
46 int main(){f1();}
47 void f1(void){
48   double x[]{10, 12, 34, 54};
49   myArray d(x, sizeof(x)/sizeof(double));
50   myArray p(d);
51   cout << "before call f2" << endl;
52   f2(p);
53 }

Friend Class

 2 int myStrcmp(char* st1, char* st2){
 3   for(; *st1 && *st2; st1++, st2++)
 4     if(*st1 < *st2) return -1;
 5     else if(*st1 > *st2) return 1;
 6   if(*st1 == '\0')
 7     if(*st2 == '\0') return 0;
 8     else return -1;
 9   return 1;
10 }
11 class universityClass;
12 class student{
13   char name[20]="";
14   long long  id;
15   char address[50]="";
16   public:
17   void input(void){
18     cout<<"Enter name:"; cin>>name;
19     cout<<"id:"; cin>>id;
20     cout<<"address:"; cin>>address;
21   }
22   void print(void){
23     cout << "name:\t" << name << endl;
24     cout << "id:\t" << id << endl;
25     cout << "address:\t" << address << endl;
26   }
27   friend class universityClass;
28 };
29 class universityClass{
30   student st[50];
31   double marks[50]={0};
32   int n=0;
33   char instructor[20]="";
34   public:
35   void input(void){
36     cout << "Enter number of students:";
37     cin >> n;
38     for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
39       st[i].input();
40     cout << "Enter name of instructor:";
41     cin >> instructor;
42   }
43   void print(void){
44     cout << "number of students:" << n;
45     cout << endl << "instructor: "
46       << instructor << endl;
47     for(int i=0; i < n; i++){
48       st[i].print();
49       cout << "mark: " << marks[i] << endl;
50     }
51   }
52   void changeMark(char stName[20],
53     double mark){
54     int i;
55     for(i=0; i < n; i++)
56      if(myStrcmp(stName, st[i].name) == 0)
57        marks[i] = mark;
58   }
59 };
60 int main(){ universityClass stList;
61   stList.input();
62   stList.print();
63 }

Dynamic Memory in Class(I)

 2 class student{
 3   char* name = nullptr;
 4   long long id;
 5   char* address = nullptr;
 6   public:
 7   void input(void){
 8     char nm[1000], ad[1000];
 9     int i;
10     cout << "Enter name: ";
11     cin >> nm;
12     for(i=0; nm[i]; i++);
13     name = new char[++i];
14     for(; i >= 0; i--)
15       name[i] = nm[i];
16     cout << "Enter address: ";
17     cin >> ad;
18     for(i=0; ad[i]; i++);
19     address = new char[++i];
20     for(; i>=0; i--)
21       address[i] = ad[i];
22     cout << "Enter id: ";
23     cin >> id;
24   }
25   void print(void){
26     cout << "name:\t" << name << endl;
27     cout << "id:\t" << id << endl;
28     cout << "address:\t" << address << endl;
29   }
30 };
31 void f1(void){
32   student s1[100];
33   s1[0].input();
34 }
35 void f2(void){
36   student s1[2000];
37   s1[0].input();
38 }
39 int main(){f1(); f2();}

Dynamic Memory in Class(II)

 2 class student{
 3   char* name = nullptr;
 4   long long id;
 5   char* address = nullptr;
 6   public:
 7   void input(void){
 8     char nm[1000], ad[1000];
 9     int i;
10     cout << "Enter name: ";
11     cin >> nm;
12     for(i=0; nm[i]; i++);
13     name = new char[++i];
14     for(; i >= 0; i--)
15       name[i] = nm[i];
16     cout << "Enter address: ";
17     cin >> ad;
18     for(i=0; ad[i]; i++);
19     address = new char[++i];
20     for(i=0; i>=0; i++)
21       address[i] = ad[i];
22     cout << "Enter id: ";
23     cin >> id;
24   }
25   void print(void){
26     cout << "name:\t" << name << endl;
27     cout << "id:\t" << id << endl;
28     cout << "address:\t" << address << endl;
29   }
30   ~student(){
31     delete[] name;
32     delete[] address;
33     name = nullptr;
34     address = nullptr;
35   }
36 };
37 void f1(void){
38   student s1[100];
39   s1[0].input();
40 }
41 void f2(void){
42   student s1[2000];
43   s1[0].input();
44 }
45 int main(){
46   f1();
47   f2();
48   return 0;
49 }

Multidimensional Dynamic Array

 2 int main(){
 3   int **ma;
 4   ma = new int *[10];
 5   for(auto i = 0; i < 10; i++)
 6     ma[i] = new int[20];
 7   for(auto i = 0; i < 10; i++){
 8     delete[] ma[i];
 9     ma[i] = nullptr;
10   }
11   delete[] ma;
12   ma = nullptr;
13   cout << " after **ma" << endl;
14   cout << "Before ***pma" << endl;
15   int ***pma;
16   pma = new int**[10];
17   for(auto i = 0; i < 10; i++){
18     pma[i] = new int*[20];
19     for(auto j = 0; j < 20; j++){
20       *(*(pma+i)+j) = new int[30];
21       for(auto k = 0; k < 30; k++)
22         *(*(*(pma+i)+j)+k ) = k+i+j;
23     }
24   }
25   for(auto i = 0; i < 10; i++){
26     for(auto j = 0; j < 20; j++){
27       for(auto k = 0; k < 30; k++)
28         cout << *(*(*(pma+i)+j)+k ) << endl;
29     }
30   }
31   for(auto i = 0; i < 10; i++){
32     for(auto j = 0; j < 20; j++){
33       delete[] *(*(pma+i)+j);
34       *(*(pma+i)+j) = nullptr;
35     }
36     delete[] *(pma+i);
37     *(pma+i) = nullptr;
38   }
39   delete[] pma;
40   pma = nullptr;
41  cout << "At the end of program" << endl;
42 }

Four Pillars of OOP

  • Encapsulation
  • Abstraction
  • Polymorphism
  • Inheritence
  • reference
  • static
  • new /delete
  • pointers
  • struct copy
  • Array value
  • Function const arguments
